resources.string: Kampala is Uganda\'s national and commercial capital bordering Lake Victoria, Africa\'s largest lake. Hills covered with red-tile villas and trees surround an urban centre of contemporary skyscrapers. In this downtown area, the Uganda Museum explores the country\'s tribal heritage through an extensive collection of artefacts. On nearby Mengo Hill is Lubiri Palace, the former seat of the Buganda Kingdom

Elevation: 1,190 m
Area: 189 km²
Weather: 19°C, Wind W at 6 km/h, 94% Humidity
Local time: Tuesday 03:15
Population: 1.507 million (2014) United Nations
